title: Beekman 1802 Almanac Hits 60,000 Newsstands Today
text:
Beekman Media
This modern take on the classic almanacs of the 19th Century will provide inspiration and countless ways to "cultivate a better life"
NEW YORK , Oct. 6,
WHAT:
Brent Ridge and Josh-Kilmer-Purcell , widely known for their best-selling books; the Beekman 1802 Mercantile shop; stars of the Planet Green and Cooking Channel's Fabulous Beekman Boys reality TV series; and winners of the CBS reality series The Amazing Race launch Beekman 1802 Almanac today, a curated collection of seasonal recipes, gardening tips, shopping discoveries and quirky stories. Inspired by almanac publications from the 19 th century, Beekman 1802 Almanac offers a modern take on these all-in-one resources, which once provided long-range weather forecasts, household tips and recipes. As told through the voices of favorite neighbors, Beekman 1802 Almanac offers fresh-from-the-farm inspiration and a glimpse into life on the Sharon Springs, NY farm that Brent and Josh have called home since 2008.
Published seasonally, the premiere issue of Beekman 1802 Almanac includes 55 farm-to-table recipes, holiday entertaining tips and easy ideas for cultivating a better life this season. More features inside this issue include:
Dream Catchers – A profile of seven pioneers who decamped from big cities to open businesses in smaller, up-and-coming travel destinations. The Gift Guide – Browse 71 Made-in-America gift ideas, starting at just $5 . A Seasoned Feast – Brent and Josh's ultimate holiday meal is a mix of old and new recipes - from roast pork loin with cornbread stuffing to winter kabocha squash pie. Chocolate & Spice – Cayenne, cardamom and ginger add new dimension to chocolate cakes, pies, cookies and candies. Keep it Green – Designer Tricia Foley strips away the opulence and opts for a simple holiday décor palette of holly and pine. The Ice Harvest – Brent and Josh make ice the old-fashioned way: slicing it straight from a frozen pond. WHERE:
Available at stores nationwide including Target, Lowe's, Ralphs, Home Depot, Whole Foods, Kroger, and Barnes & Noble.
To find stockists carrying Beekman 1802 Almanac, visit
http://magfinder.magnetdata.net/
COST:
$9.99
WHEN:
On newsstands starting October 6, 2015 and available through January 3, 2016 .
INFO:
Beekman 1802
www.beekman1802.com

ABOUT BEEKMAN MEDIA LLC
Beekman 1802 Almanac is the first venture from Beekman Media, a multi-platform content company spun-off from the highly successful Beekman 1802 lifestyle brand of products. Beekman 1802 founders, Josh Kilmer-Purcell and Brent Ridge , are authors of several best-selling books, stars of the Plane Green and Cooking Channel's Fabulous Beekman Boys reality TV series, winners of the CBS reality series The Amazing Race , and frequent talk show guests.
Beekman Media will continue to promote Brent and Josh's messages of how to "Cultivate a Better Life" to their growing customer/fan base with authentic and inspiring content delivered across all of their digital platforms, a magazine, future TV/video productions, books and events. Additionally, Beekman Media will seek out and develop new authors and talents across all of its media platforms.
